name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add to Giftster Wish List Registry

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items from any store to your Giftster wish lists, including child account wish lists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add items to your Giftster wish list while you shop. Tap the Giftster button in your browser toolbar while on a product page to add the item to your wish list. Giftster fetches the item details automatically. Edit attributes such as color or size to ensure your family will get the details right. 

Have a child account? Easily add items to any of your child account wish lists too!

Get gifts right. Every time.
